name: Don't turn off the Light!
description:
Really short 2D horror game. Simple graphics & gameplay.

Warning: The game contains flashing lights and loud noises.

The friend told you to keep the light on, but he left and now it's your decision. Best played in night. This game also features "secret" ending.

This game was made for "Trijam - 160" it was my eighth Game Jam. The theme was "Don't turn it off".

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 3 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
